description: kind (Kubernetes IN Docker) - local Kubernetes clusters using Docker containers

common_errors.cause: Docker daemon is not running or accessible
common_errors.solution: Start Docker with 'systemctl start docker' or start Docker Desktop

common_errors.cause: Requested port is already in use by another process
common_errors.solution: Change port mapping in kind config or stop conflicting process

common_errors.cause: Specified kind cluster does not exist
common_errors.solution: List clusters with 'kind get clusters', create with 'kind create cluster'
Validate YAML syntax, check kind config schema documentation
Check network connectivity, verify image reference, pre-load with 'kind load docker-image'

common_errors.cause: Error updating or using kubeconfig for kind cluster
common_errors.solution: Run 'kind export kubeconfig --name <cluster>' to regenerate kubeconfig

common_errors.cause: Kubernetes node failed to become ready
common_errors.solution: Check Docker resource limits, review node logs with 'docker logs <kind-node>'
Increase Docker Desktop memory limit, reduce number of nodes in cluster

common_errors.cause: Error loading local Docker image into kind cluster
common_errors.solution: Verify image exists locally with 'docker images', check cluster is running
Wait for kindnet to initialize, or use custom CNI in kind config
